name: Duzle
text: The café itself is quaint and chill, and the lady who runs it is charming and lively! Street parking. The location is within their home community, to which they wish to give back by providing a healthy alternative such as this. I had the "millionaire 'burger'" along with sweet potato fries - quite tasty! It was piled high with veggies, avocado, and other add-ons. The burger look and texture was great. As usual with meat substitutes, you must treat it as a new kind of "meat" rather than compare it to actual beef. If you do this and let it stand on its own, this burger (along with other substitutes) tastes great. Next time I'm here, I want to try the jackfruit "pulled pork" and possibly a smoothie. This was my first vegan restaurant experience and it was quite lovely! Highly recommended for those hesitant on exploring this new type of cuisine.

name: Have Thread Will Travel
text: Long story short, after many doctor's appointments I was diagnosed with fibromyalgia and put on meds that made me gain a bunch of weight and masked the pain.  I was told that my condition would always be just a matter of managing the symptoms and that I could either treat it with opioids (no thanks) or anti depressants.  After about a year of feeling like a zombie, gaining a bunch of weight, and overall still being exhausted and in pain (just not caring due to the meds) I decided that was not a lifestyle I was willing to continue with.  I stopped by the cbd store just to chat about my options. The staff was very warm and welcoming and answered all of my questions without making me feel pushed into buying something.  Margo recommended I try CBG oil for both my pain and energy issues.  I'm now completely off all my prescription meds and am doing much better than I had been on them.  I've learned to manage my pain and energy in a much more effective way that doesn't mess with my weight or personality.  Every time I stop in they are super friendly and the store is very clean and welcoming.  I love that they are always willing to check up on me and make sure that the products I use are still working for me. If you're unsure about any of these topics I definently recommend stopping by and chatting with them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your story and giving us a review.  As we always say in the store, we are not just a place to buy CBD but a place to gain education and have support after adding this wonderful plant to your daily diet.  What a difference it has made for you!  We also appreciate you bringing in your family, thank you for trusting us to take good care of them.  We will see you guys soon!

name: Theresa Todd
text: I am very pleased with the service and products at Your CBD Store.  When exploring CBD oil for our dog, I went to a different store at first.  They weren't confident on dosage amounts.  After discussing the encounter with our vet tech earning her certification on this very subject, and showing her the product, she found that oil was so weak that one bottle was only 2 doses for our sized dog.  She recommended we go to Your CBD Store.  I found Margo very knowledgeable about her products for pets.  I came prepared with questions from the vet tech, and Margo was either able to answer them or knew where to find the answer within minutes.  In addition, Margo was very pleasant and not once did she make me feel like I was an imposition by asking questions in this new area we were exploring.  Thank you, Margo.  You set a great example of great customer service...and products.  Within about a week, our dog was acting like she did pre-arthritis.  I highly recommend Your CBD Store!

resp.text: Theresa, thank you for your kind review.  We research extensively to bring as much knowledge and great product to you as possible.  We are grateful to hear how your dog has responded to having this healthy plant in her diet.  I know you enjoy watching her move with more ease.  Thank you for your loyalty, we enjoy the friendships made here!

text: Dr. Larry Koval:  Della, Margo, Rebekah and staff, are health care professionals that will help you navigate the many potential health benefits of CBD (cannabidiol) products.  For me, CBD has helped to wean off of Tylenol, Non-Steroidals (e.g. Ibuprofen) or other pain medications with many known adverse effects.  CBD (with no THC) is now legal in all 50 States, but the regulation and safety process for agriculture and the consumer is just beginning: so we need trusted small business professionals to help guide us. . .  I have found Your CBD store to fill this important role.   You are sure to enjoy the TLC of this lovely family of sisters that are in business together, one of which is the Enterprise, AL location.  Larry Koval, O.D.
